description: This file contains function prototypes and API declarations related to the Slap Obj Record Object, part of the Service Logic Aggregation Plane implementation. It includes creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions for the object.

methods.name: SlapCreateObjRecord
methods.description: Function to create a new Slap Obj Record object with provided container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: SlapOroCreate
methods.description: Function to instantiate a new Slap Obj Record object with given context handles.

methods.name: SlapOroRemove
methods.description: Function to remove or delete the given Slap Obj Record object.

methods.name: SlapOroEnrollObjects
methods.description: Function to enroll necessary objects or dependencies for the Slap Obj Record.

methods.name: SlapOroInitialize
methods.description: Function to initialize the Slap Obj Record object.
